frameDefinitions: A Factor affects the outcome of an Undertaking, which  can be a goal-oriented activity or the maintenance of a desirable state, the work in a Field, or something portrayed as affecting an Interested_party.

The answer to one open question, the Outcome, is dictated (partially or completely) by the answer to another open question, the Determinant, i.e. if the answer to the Determinant is known, the answer to the Outcome can be predicted.

An Influencing_entity, an Influencing_situation, or an Influencing_variable has an influence on a Dependent_entity, Dependent_situation,  or a Dependent_variable.  ''  Compare to Subjective_influence.
An Agent creates a Knot (possibly in a Place and/or with an Instrument).'
This frame contains items which, when manipulated, alter the function of some device, internal or external.
A concept, Concept_1, is related causally or collocationally to another concept, Concept_2 by means of some evidence.
frameExamples: Temperature is the most <t>critical</t> factor in successful storage.
Economic policy is partially a <t>function</t> of cultural values.
More and more doctors realise that diet can <t>influence</t> disease.
Loretta <t>ties</t> the most beautiful bowline I've ever seen.
This <t>button</t> makes the radio turn on.
listRoleDefinitions: <fen>Factor</fen> is used for the concrete or abstract entity whose importance is assessed.
The <fen>Undertaking</fen> is a process or state or field of activity in which the <fen>Interested_party</fen> has a stake.
<fen>Interested_party</fen> identifies the people who are affected by a particular <fen>Factor</fen>.
A <fen>Factor</fen> may be generally important to the people or the activities in a field of endeavour.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important to the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Factor</fen> is important.
An open question that is (to some degree) predictable from the Determinant.
An open question that determines the <fen>Outcome</fen>.
A thing or person whose behavior has an effect on an <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>, <fen>Dependent_situation</fen>, or <fen>Dependent_variable</fen>.
An entity, usually a thing, that is influenced in its behavior by an <fen>Influencing_entity</fen> or an <fen>Influencing_situation</fen>.
A scalar variable (with unspecified value) which has  an effect on the <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>, <fen>Dependent_situation</fen>, or <fen>Dependent_variable</fen>.
A situation that whose temporal or other characteristics are influenced by an <fen>Influencing_entity</fen>, <fen>Influencing_situation</fen>, or <fen>Influencing_variable</fen>.
A scalar variable, whose value depends on the behavior of an <fen>Influencing_entity</fen>, a <fen>Influencing_situation</fen>, or an <fen>Influencing_variable</fen>.
A situation whose temporal or other characteristics have an effect on a <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>, <fen>Dependent_situation</fen>, or <fen>Dependent_variable</fen>.
The <fen>Degree</fen> to which the <fen>Influencing_entity</fen> effects the <fen>Dependent_entity</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the influence occurs.
The location at which the influencing occurs.
The Agent is the person performing the intentional act.
The stable configuration of a String which results from tying.
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
This role identifies the entity or substance that is designed to have a particular <fen>Use</fen>. This is often an incorporated FE.
The concept which is linked to <fen>Concept_2</fen>.  Generally expressed as the external argument.
The concept which is tied to <fen>Concept_1</fen>.  Generally expressed as a PP complement.
The two concepts expressed jointly.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Being sure they are buying fresh food</fex> is important to most people.
Temperature is the most critical factor <fex>in successful storage</fex>.
Being sure they are buying fresh food is important <fex>to most people</fex>.
A successful GATT round is important <fex>for the world economy</fex>.
Price, in such a case, depends <fex>only on the whim of the supplier</fex>.

Much of the acreage in this round is closer to the coastline, and as such has many implications in terms of how <fex>it</fex> could impact upon fish spawning, local bird life, and even the Ministry of Defence in some cases
The Committee is responsible for making recommendations to the Board regarding the group's activities as they impact <fex>on the environment</fex>.
<fex>Factors which</fex> influence the stability of the combination include the softness of the car and the trailer's suspension, plus the balance of the trailer.
The new network file system server line supports database or backup applications running alongside NFS input/output operations without one activity impacting <fex>another</fex>.
This kind of elementary boo-boo would certainly impact <fex>video speed</fex>.
